title: PTD Today — Media

items.title: TTEC accelerates AI deployment and revenue streams with Google Cloud Consulting

ai.summary: Based on the available description, TTEC partnered with Google Cloud Consulting to rapidly prototype and deploy AI solutions that unlocked new revenue streams. Sreeni Alakappan says TTEC used Generative AI and Google Cloud infrastructure to streamline operations, boost developer productivity, and compress its digital transformation timeline.
bullets: TTEC collaborated with Google Cloud Consulting to accelerate AI prototyping and deployment.
Generative AI and Google Cloud infrastructure were leveraged to improve operations and developer productivity.
The engagement enabled new revenue opportunities for TTEC.
Google Cloud Consulting helped shorten the company’s digital transformation timeline.
The partnership expanded TTEC’s ambitions for what’s possible with AI.
takeaways: Invest in scalable cloud infrastructure to support rapid GenAI prototyping and deployment.
Engage cloud consulting to compress transformation timelines and reduce time-to-value.
Prioritizing developer productivity can accelerate feature delivery and operational efficiency.
Deploying GenAI can create new revenue streams, so plan infrastructure and capacity accordingly.

items.title: Watch Live: Fed Chair Jerome Powell Holds News Conference | WSJ

ai.summary: Based on the available description, Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell speaks to reporters following the Federal Reserve's two-day policy-setting meeting. The WSJ streamed his live news conference.
bullets: Event: Jerome Powell news conference
Context: Immediately after a two-day Fed policy-setting meeting
Format: Live remarks to reporters
Source: WSJ News streamed the event
Transcript: No transcript provided in the video description
takeaways: Monitor the live remarks or obtain the official transcript to capture any policy guidance relevant to planning.
Consider reviewing Powell's statements before finalizing near-term budgeting or procurement decisions where feasible.
Ensure decision-makers have access to the WSJ feed or the Fed's official release for accurate, timely information.
Record and archive the conference or transcript for audit and post-event analysis once available.

items.title: Year-end toolkit: Strengthening audit committee collaboration

ai.summary: Based on the available description, this episode of PwC’s Year-end toolkit series covers how finance teams can strengthen collaboration with audit committees during a busy year-end accounting and reporting cycle. It highlights improving management/audit committee communication, preparing for key year-end issues, and oversight of emerging topics such as AI, enterprise risk management, cyber risk, and proxy disclosures.
bullets: Focus on strengthening communication and collaboration between management and the audit committee.
Walkthrough of key year-end accounting and reporting issues finance teams should be ready to address.
Discussion of AI oversight: risks, opportunities, and necessary controls.
Guidance on enhancing enterprise risk oversight and navigating evolving cyber risks in the AI era.
Considerations for elevating proxy disclosures and governance communication.
takeaways: Keep audit committees updated on year-end accounting/reporting priorities and any impacts from transformation initiatives to enable faster decision-making.
Document AI-related risks, opportunities, and control frameworks so audit committees can assess oversight needs and governance implications.
Integrate cyber risk considerations into enterprise risk discussions, particularly where AI changes threat profiles or operational dependencies.

items.title: Zip Up, Clip In, Copilot On

ai.summary: Based on the available description, route planning made easy—Jo discovers the power of Copilot Groups in a short Microsoft Copilot video. The clip emphasizes Copilot Groups for simplifying route planning and is tagged #copilot #microsoftcopilot #ai.
bullets: Title: "Zip Up, Clip In, Copilot On."
Focus: Jo discovers Copilot Groups for route planning.
Core message: "Route planning made easy."
Hashtags included: #copilot #microsoftcopilot #ai
takeaways: If your operations include route planning or crew routing, the video flags Copilot Groups as potentially relevant—consider evaluating similar AI-assisted routing features for pilot tests.
The user-centered angle (Jo) highlights the importance of usability; prioritize trials that assess worker adoption and training needs before wider rollout.
Tags link this to Microsoft Copilot and AI—keep vendor updates and feature announcements on your watchlist for integration opportunities.

items.title: Audyt w erze AI: praktyczne zastosowania i realne korzyści | Katarzyna Chojniak, Alicja Barska

ai.summary: Based on the available description… W odcinku KPMG ON AIR Katarzyna Chojniak i Alicja Barska omawiają praktyczne zastosowania sztucznej inteligencji w audycie — narzędzia wspierające analizę pełnych populacji danych, automatyzację powtarzalnych zadań oraz ulepszoną komunikację z klientem. Poruszają też zmiany roli audytora, wyzwania wdrożeniowe, kwestie bezpieczeństwa danych i regulacje oraz przyszłość AI w procesie badania.
bullets: Narzędzia AI (np. AI Transaction Scoring Tool) umożliwiają analizę pełnych populacji danych zamiast próbkowania.
Clara AI działa jako konwersacyjny asystent oraz zestaw wyspecjalizowanych agentów wspierających pracę audytową.
AI wspomaga dokumentację i analizę ujawnień oraz zarządzanie badaniem w czasie rzeczywistym poprzez platformę KPMG Clara.
Clara for Clients ułatwia nowoczesną komunikację z klientem i dostęp do wyników audytu.
Omówione są też wyzwania wdrożeniowe, adaptacja kompetencji audytorów oraz aspekty bezpieczeństwa danych i regulacji.
takeaways: Przygotuj dane i procesy do analizy pełnych populacji — audyty oparte na pełnych danych stają się coraz powszechniejsze.
Spodziewaj się szybszej dokumentacji i lepszej komunikacji z audytorem dzięki platformom typu Clara; rozważ integrację systemów z takim narzędziem.
Priorytetem pozostaje bezpieczeństwo danych i zgodność regulacyjna — oceniaj rozwiązania AI pod kątem ochrony informacji.
Inwestuj w kompetencje zespołu dotyczące pracy z AI i interpretacji wyników, bo rola audytora ewoluuje w kierunku nadzoru i analizy.
